verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:15
verses.text: And he sent out arrows, and scattered them; lightning, and discomfited them.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:16
verses.text: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the Lord, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:17
verses.text: He sent from above, he took me; he drew me out of many waters;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:18
verses.text: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them that hated me: for they were too strong for me.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:19
verses.text: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the Lord was my stay.
